thread.title: Rafa Benitez to Arsenal: He's on Gunners shortlist, will ask Thierry Henry to join him
thread.title_full: Rafa Benitez to Arsenal: He's on Gunners shortlist, will ask Thierry Henry to join him

title: Rafa Benitez to Arsenal: He's on Gunners shortlist, will ask Thierry Henry to join him
text:
GETTY Rafa Benitez is the shock name on the Arsenal radar 
The Newcastle boss is on the Gunners' shortist to replace Arsene Wenger if he leaves in the summer, according to the Mirror . 
And his first move could be to bring club legend Thierry Henry in with him. 
It's claimed Henry could command a place on the coaching staff if Benitez gets the gig. 
Benitez is loved in Newcastle and the club would be desperate for him to stay. Arsenal's four-man shortlist to replace Arsene Wenger Friday, 10th February 2017 ARSENAL have reportedly started planning for if Arsene Wenger decides to leave at the end of the season. *Reported by the Mirror. 1 / 6 GETTY Arsenal's four-man shortlist to replace Arsene Wenger 
It's likely the Toon will be in the Premier League next season - meaning Benitez is back managing in the top tier after a season away. 
But the Spaniard has shown signs of discontent and he was recently upset about the club not carrying out his transfer wishes in January. 
Wenger is out of contract at the end of the season and he's yet to pen a new deal. 
Former Liverpool boss Benitez is not the only name in the frame to replace him, though. 
GETTY Arsene Wenger's future as Arsenal boss is uncertain 
Borussia Dortmundâ€™s Thomas Tuchel is the bookies' favourite while Luis Enrique and Leonardo Jardim are also in the reckoning. 
Henry has spent time coaching the youth teams at Arsenal after hanging up his boots. 
And the Gunners great has also been cutting his teeth in management alongside Roberto Martinez with Belgium. Related articles
